title: X-Country JV Champs
caption: November 2nd
description: Good luck to the UHS Cross Country team as they take on the X-Country JV Championship at Woodward Park on November 2nd, 2022.

title: Girls Playoffs
caption: November 2nd
description: Come support our UHS girls basketball as we have our playoffs on November 2nd: Duncan Polytechnical High School beginning at 5:15 PM. Go UHS!

title: Vision/Hearing Test
caption: November 4th
description: The freshmen will be having their vision and hearing screenings on November 4th, 2022 from 8:00 AM - 10:00 AM. Nothing needs to be done to prepare for this. Contact the Front Office if you have any questions.

title: Symphony Concert
caption: November 8th
description: The Symphony Orchestra will be having its concert next Tuesday, November 8th at Paul Shaghoian Memorial Concert Hall (adjacent to Clovis North). Please come support our Symphony Orchestra at its first concert of the year! Any questions? Ask Dr. C!
